attributes.action: Give EMA to children who would choose to continue with higher education without EMA as an incentive.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EMA is a biaste regime which caters to those who do not which to work and allows those who do to be pushed to the side. For many this is because of there parents income. These children who are left by the wayside it is there parents who have paid the taxes that allow other children to receive EMA and though the Government does not recognise this many of these children only receive approximately £10 a week off of there parents.
